INVALID_PROVIDER: You must provide a valid database provider.
INVALID_PATH: You must provide a valid database path.
INVALID_REPOSITORY_NAME: You must provide a valid repository name.
INVALID_REPOSITORY_SCHEMA: You must provide a valid repository schema.
INVALID_REPOSITORY_DATABASE: You must provide a valid repository database.
INVALID_CREATE_DATA: You must provide a valid data to create. Missing required keys or invalid data.
INVALID_UPDATE_DATA: You must provide a valid data to update. Invalid update data types.
DATABASE_NOT_INITIALIZED: You must initialize the database before performing this operation.
